IX.i.3.D.3.c
.
Denying a Deduction for Expenses of Last Illness
Deny a deduction for expenses of last illness if those same expenses have been reported to VA as UMEs.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section D - Reduction of Income Due to Unreimbursed Expenses
citation: Part IX, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section D
